root.title: saudi french bank doubl paid up capit
root.body: al bank al saudi al fransi also know saudi french doubl paid up capit 400 mln riyal 200 mln convert reserv equiti bank offici say jeddah bas saudi french 40 pct own banqu indosuez 60 pct saudi public sign technic servic agreement indosuez riyadh tuesday manag bank next five year say offici say increas paid up capit doubl number share held sharehold add depth market extend trade investor
